review: Got it in and it didn't work,  Remote would stream things so fast you couldn't even read.  Just defective I guess but I notified Amazon and got an instant  refund.  Customer service is just the greatest!  Haven't decide if I am going to get the larger box as of yet.

review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick for the Netflix accessibility. I was also hoping to get TV shows that were available free of charge, also free of charge with the Fire Stick. That is not the case. Most things cost money. Because of that, I am not entirely pleased. The Fire Stick does give me Netflix as I wanted.
